title: No children node listing when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab
OB: When attempting to change the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, no children nodes are listed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the children nodes of the new data source should be listed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the dataset editor page in the query tab.
2. Select a dataset.
3. Attempt to change the data source for the selected dataset.
4. Verify that no children nodes are listed for the new data source.
